VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Air Express relative to Cross-Border Trucks?
SRP.A: Air Express is {below} Cross-Border Trucks in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total cargo shipments?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Parcel Services}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total cargo shipments?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Cross-Border Trucks}.

VE.Q: What is Continental Freight's Cargo Shipments in 2003?
VE.A: Continental Freight's cargo shipments in 2003 is {64698.06} tons/month.

VE.Q: What is Oceanic Carriers's Cargo Shipments in 2004?
VE.A: Oceanic Carriers's cargo shipments in 2004 is {37321.76} tons/month.

VE.Q: What is Parcel Services's Cargo Shipments in 2010?
VE.A: Parcel Services's cargo shipments in 2010 is {240658.16} tons/month.

VE.Q: What are the cargo shipments of Rail Networks, Continental Freight, and Air Express in 1993?
VE.A: Rail Networks's cargo shipments is {112809.86} tons/month, Continental Freight's cargo shipments is {97610.48} tons/month, Air Express's cargo shipments is {117344.72} tons/month.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Cargo Shipments in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum cargo shipments is {1000.00} tons/month.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Cargo Shipments in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum cargo shipments is {264222.21} tons/month.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Cargo Shipments level recorded for Air Express?
EVJ.A: Air Express reached approximately {257478.05} tons/month in {2011}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Cargo Shipments level recorded for Air Express?
EVJ.A: Air Express's lowest recorded level is approximately {92768.28} tons/month in {1991}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Cargo Shipments?
SC.A: The average total cargo shipments is {705979.68} tons/month.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Cargo Shipments fall between 671317.48 and 741982.48 tons/month? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Cargo Shipments exceed 736095.90 tons/month? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Cargo Shipments go below 677204.06 tons/month? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1999 and 2003, was the average total Cargo Shipments higher or lower than between 1992 and 2004?
NC.A: The average total cargo shipments between 1999 and 2003 was {higher} than between 1992 and 2004.

NC.Q: Between 1996 and 1999, did the total Cargo Shipments experience a larger or smaller change than between 1993 and 1997?
NC.A: The change in total cargo shipments between 1996 and 1999 was {larger} than between 1993 and 1997.

NC.Q: Between 1993 and 2000, did the total Cargo Shipments experience a larger or smaller change than between 1991 and 1999?
NC.A: The change in total cargo shipments between 1993 and 2000 was {smaller} than between 1991 and 1999.

NC.Q: Was the total Cargo Shipments in 2006 higher or lower than in 2010?
NC.A: The total cargo shipments in 2006 was {lower} than in 2010.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Parcel Services} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Cross-Border Trucks, Oceanic Carriers, QuickShip Logistics, Continental Freight, Rail Networks, Parcel Services, Air Express}.
